title: Bethenny Frankel posts provocative photo showing 9-year-old daughter's hands on her breasts
text:
Before Kim Kardashian did it, Bethenny Frankel did it.

Launch a signature line of shapewear, that is.

And on Tuesday, the now former Real Housewives of New York star, 48, posted a provocative promotion for her Skinnygirl Shapewear to her Instagram, in which she posed with her nine-year-old daughter standing behind her with her hands on her mom's breasts.

Promoting her shapewear: Bethenny Frankel posted this provocative photo to Instagram Tuesday showing daughter Brynn, 9, standing behind her with her hands on her mom's breasts

Frankel is wearing a long white tank top and short black shorts from her collection.

Her brunette hair is tousled and she sports glossy lip color.

Brynn, whose face is hidden as she stands behind the reality star, is wearing a pastel patterned sweatshirt.

In the caption, Frankel wrote: 'I have all the support I need (hands not included with purchase). Get #skinnygirlshapewear to feel supported AND sexy!'

close: Frankel shares Brynn with her ex-husband Jason Hoppy with whom she has gone through a bitter divorce and custody battle. Mother and daughter are pictured in March 2016

The businesswoman launched her line of undergarments in December 2018 following the launch earlier that year of Skinnygirl jeans.

Her shapewear includes shaping underwear as well as shaping camis, tanks and hipsters.

Frankel shares her daughter with her ex-husband Jason Hoppy with whom she has gone through a bitter divorce and custody battle.

Meanwhile, she is enjoying a new romance with businessman Paul Bernon.

The couple started dating last year and on Monday, she shared photos of the couple attending a wedding together.

She shared a snap to Instagram showing herself in a cleavage-baring black jumpsuit and her boyfriend in a suit and tie with the caption: 'Love is in the air.'

'Love is in the air': The former RHONY star, 48, is enjoying a new romance with businessman Paul Bernon and shared pics Monday of them attending a wedding together
description: Brynn's face is hidden as she stands behind the reality star, who is wearing a long white tank top and short black shorts from her collection.
